website_summaries.verdict: The aim of the Brooks Ariel '20 is to utilize modern technologies to maintain the quality performance associated with the series. This optimized-for-women road running shoe features a less bulky construction and a stable platform that consistently steadies the foot at all times. Performance and style meet with the 2020 iteration of the Ariel.
pros: Most users have noted that the stability mechanisms of the Brooks Ariel '20 are efficient and reliable
The cushioning system is lauded for being consistently comfortable, even during casual strolls
Those who have leg and knee concerns believe that the underfoot platform of this Brooks running shoe is able to protect them from injury
Some purchasers are appreciative of the minimalist upper unit, stating that the coverage didn’t seem bulky nor heavy
The traction capacity of the outsole unit is welcomed by people who value the surface control given by performance footwear
cons: Some individuals consider the forefoot section of this product to be too loose and wobbly
Stiffness has been felt by some runners
they associated this phenomenon with the extreme steadiness of the pronation-correcting midsole

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Ariel's I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Ariel 20 in March from Zappos off of the Amazon website because the seller only had one left in stock; I also liked that Amazon had a payment plan with these shoes; I feel they are the most comfortable Ariel's I have owned so far; support and alot of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Air
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are like walking on air. I was hesitant to spend so much money on sneakers, but after trying on my mother's to go for a walk a few years ago, I knew these were the only brand for me. They are very true to size (I am an 8 1/2) with plenty of room in the toe area. They fit snuggly all around the foot, too. Absolutely the most comfortable walking sneaker I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: KTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's happened to this brand/style of shoe, but they are NOT the high quality they used to be! I am SERIOUSLY disappointed! I used to buy these all of the time, they were always so dependable-- making my back and knees instantly feel better. But the 2020 style is just awful! they actually hurt my feet somewhat, and i am now starting to have pain in my ankles! Plus, sizing is completely off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on and found myself saying oooooooo ahhhhhhh! Plenty of room to wiggle toes. Good cushioning and support. I might add a little gel arch support because my feet are super flat, but I like these and I hate everything! LOL they are a nice looking shoe also, I got the black pair. If they weren’t so expensive I’d get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Worn through in less than three months.
customer_reviews.text: Although my shoes are less than three months old, and I wear them only two or three times per week, there is already a hole worn in the toe. They looked good; they’re comfortable and supportive, but I expect them to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: EZim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: I had Achilles surgery this summer and in February had an extra bone in my ankle removed. There are the most comfortable shoes I have found to date. I still walk with a bit of a limp(still healing) but these help so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Ariel 20 offers great running support.
customer_reviews.text: The Ariel 20's offer both support and comfort. A excellent running shoe in the Brooks tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Hope E. Abisamra

customer_reviews.title: More like a slipper no support
customer_reviews.text: The back heel on this shoe collapsed on the first time trying it on. It’s also fails for support it’s more like a slipper. Fail. I wish I could find the 18’s. They were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good Stability
customer_reviews.text: I give this a four star because I had to get new OTC inserts for arch support. Paying $160 for a pair of shoes that should have had adequate arch support knocked it down a star. They are good looking shoes. I prefer leather uppers and I don't think these mesh uppers will last like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Bkind

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I normally have to put inserts in my shoes to get comfort. I haven’t sat down all day and my feet feel good. If only they were made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Ami Willett

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be best
customer_reviews.text: Brooks Ariels can’t be beat. I have problems with my feet and I can put my orthotics in them. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH  VAN SICKLER

customer_reviews.title: Durability- NO
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not durable. Bought the shoes a month ago now I have a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda I Villes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit right out of the box. Wore for 12 hour shift with no issues. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sherbert

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Brooks Ariel is my shoe. I have worn this shoe for years. This shoe has great support and is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: C.O.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: ZHave been a fan of Brooks Ariel shoes for a number of years. These '20 shoes do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! So comfortable for my arches and my planters facitis.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Brooks are the best
customer_reviews.text: Only shoes I ever wear are Brooks Ariel. Best stability fit. I'm on my feet all day, start work at 5:30 a.m. get done around 2 p.m. walking around 6 miles a day through my job. Without these shoes I couldn't do my job.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome, my pediatrist recommended them. I’m so happy I purchased them. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: spshelk

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toe box
customer_reviews.text: These are much lighter and more stylish than the Ariel 18 — a bonus! Perfect shoe for those of us who need a wider toe box to accommodate foot issues!
customer_reviews.author: RoxRaised

customer_reviews.title: Larger toe box
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The style is perfect for me, with a slightly larger toe box. Would be great if there were more color options than the current two.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! Great protection for ankles yet extremely lightweight. Best running shoes I have ever had!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it ! Will Recommend It family and friends ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Juhidudeja

customer_reviews.title: Support and cushion
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are terrific!! My foot was surgically reconstructed so I must wear sneakers that are supportive but also have enough cushioning to absorb impact. The sneaker has excellent construction, padding all round, the tongue is free and well padded. Feels like walking on cushions. Highly recommended if you have foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: EDJACK

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with plantar fasciitis, a hammertoe, heel issues, and slight pronation of both feet. I have worn shoes ordered through my foot doctor, and the shoes I ordered from companies that advertise for orthopedic issues but none have been as great as these Brooks Ariel 20. They fit snuggly at my ankle and feel so comfortable when walking or even when I stand for a longer period of time. I love them and highly recommend them if you haven't been able to find a good shoe that is great to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Beach

customer_reviews.title: These shoes keep my feet from hurting.
customer_reviews.text: The Adrian 20 Books sneakers are great for plantar faciatis because of the 1 inch heel. They are very comfortable to wear. I also use inserts in my sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, stability, and durability
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this style of Brooks for quite a few years now. Because I walk a lot I need a new pair every 8 - 12 months. I am glad they continue to carry these. This is my go-to shoe for comfort, stability, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleShirley

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ariel 20's
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! They feel quite a bit lighter than the 18's. I can't imagine finding a shoe that feels better. They feel great right out of the box. They are a little smaller than the 18's. If your 18's are roomy, you should be fine with the same size. If you're in doubt, I would go up half a size.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: These shoes SHRINK when they get wet...
customer_reviews.text: I used these shoes for walking - have worn them successfully before - it was my understanding when I bought them that they were waterproof which they are not. In fact they are not even water repellent. I walked in morning grass wet from frost so shoes got wet on the toes - not soaked - and when they dried they were one half size smaller and unwearable. Outrageous for a $160.00 shoe - no more Brooks for me....
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: These are the ONLY shoes that keep my feet pain free.
customer_reviews.text: Con: Price Point. Wish these shoes were less $, but they are worth the $ to keep my feet pain free. Pro: So dang comfortable, keeps feet pain free, really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Delphinus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I gave always found Brooks Ariel shoes comfortable for every day or the gym. Only shoe I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Moreland

customer_reviews.title: No longer a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ariels for 13years. These are poor quality. No support. Had foot and ankle pain within minutes of wearing
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like colors or style
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit as well as the 2016 version, also didn’t like the style. Returned the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Colo100

customer_reviews.title: Not the real Brooks Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize they were from Zappos and not from the Brooks Store.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this brand before and never unhappy, they keep me walking!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyJ

product_meta.title: Brooks Women's Ariel '20 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Ariel ‘20 is known for its soft, stable ride, and now it's lighter than ever thanks to the newly added GuideRails support technology.
feature_bullets: THIS SHOE IS FOR: The Ariel ’20 is perfect for runners who want to turn up the dial on support, cushioning, and comfort. Runners who prefer a little extra space in the forefoot may find these to be a perfect match.
SUPER-SOFT CUSHIONING: The DNA LOFT cushioning provides a soft, luxurious feeling underfoot without losing responsiveness or durability.
ENHANCED FIT: Enjoy comfort front to back with a spacious yet secure fit thanks to an engineered-mesh upper and conformable embroidered saddle.
NEW LOOK: Embroidered saddle and eyestay create a modern look and strategic structure.

HOLISTIC SUPPORT: We've shifted our focus beyond the feet to the most injury-prone part of a runner's body: the knees. GuideRails support keeps you moving comfortably by keeping excess movement in check.
